name: Salmon with Pecan Honey Glaze
author: Kimber
summary: Beautiful, crispy salmon fillets with a honey-pecan glaze that is easy and delicious!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spread pecans in a single layer on a baking sheet
Bake 8 to 10 minutes, or until slightly browned
Stir 2 or 3 times to toast uniformly
In a small saucepan over medium-high heat, combine honey with half of the butter
Stir in the toasted pecans, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes to infuse the flavors
Remove from heat, and keep warm
Melt remaining butter with oil in a large skillet over high heat
Season fish with salt and pepper
Arrange fillets in skillet, and cook until firm to the touch, about 4 to 5 minutes per side
Salmon is done when it flakes easily with a fork
Transfer to serving plate, and spoon glaze over top
